kalaya manda nisa me prathicharaya thabanne mathalan ge lipiya pamanak kiyawa.mage prathicharaya thula wenath patakayeku danatamath dakwa athi adahas ath nam samawanna)sirasa suparstar-2 n pasu kisidu riyaliti sho ekak nobaluwemi.me wadasatahan walin godayanne madhyaya aayathanaya ha durakathana jala pamanaki.(samanya keti paniwidayak satha 30 k wana wita me manapa paniwidayak rupiyal 5 da ikmawayi).balahath karayen upaddawana bihikarana tharu walata pawathmak natha.kata hari welawa thiyenawa nam wiwidha madhaya aayathana magin eda meda thura sanwidhanaya kala ek ek riyaliti sho saha jayagrahakayin layisthuwak sada balanna.ma kiyanna watahewi.boho supiritharu badawiyatha rakaganne jothipala ho royi piris wani janapriya gayakayek ghathanaya kirimen.(parani githa nawatha nawatha gayimen nawa sangithayak bihiwanne keseda?).swothsahayen kalaya gathakota bihiwana gayakayan ge (riyaliti haraha noena) pawathma sthawarayi.owunta anun ge githa gaya badawiwatha raka ganna awashya na.(uda,kasun kalhara,chandana liyanaaarachchi, ajith muthukumarana, prins udaya priyantha, damith asanka, shasika nisansala, samantha perera,janaka wikramasinha, saman jayanath jinadasa, subhani harshani,lakshman hewawitharana..........layisthuwa thawa godak digayi - me nam ahambau lesa gaththuwa).

sabawak numbaalata kiyami: owunge wipakaya owunta labi thibe. 17 numuth numbaa niraharayen inna kalhi rahasigathawa wasana numbae piyananwahanseta misa numbaa niraharayen inna bawa manushyayanta nopenena pinisa, 18 numbae hise thel ga, muhuna soda ganna; ewita rahasin dakina numbae piyananwahanse numbaata wipaka denaseka. 19 polowehi numbaalata wasthu raskara nothabanna; ehidi kawoda malakadada eewa nasthikarathi, soruda umankana soraganithi. 20 numuth swargayehi numbaalata wasthu raskara thaba ganna; ehidi kawowath malakadawath eewa nasthi nokarathi, soru umankana sora noganithi. 21 maknisada numbae wasthuwa yam thanekhida numbae sithath ethanhima wanneya. 22 shariraye pahana nam asaya.
